name: frontend-boilerplate
description: my setup for a frontend website

scripts.dev: export PORT=3000; export NODE_ENV=development; rm -rf webpack-assets.json; concurrently --kill-others 'babel-node webpacks/webpack-dev-server.js' 'nodemon --exec 'babel-node' --debug  src/server'
scripts.prod: export PORT=8080; export NODE_ENV=production; rm -rf webpack-assets.json; webpack --verbose --colors --display-error-details --config webpacks/config.prod.babel.js; node bin/server.js

author: jonathan garcia
